name: src/config/custom.js
content:
/**
* @author       Jade Krafsig <jade@design1online.com>
* @copyright    Design1Online.com, LLC
* @license      {@link https://github.com/design1online/phaser3-es6-webpack-template/blob/master/LICENSE|MIT License}
*/

/**
* @desc Your game's custom configuration values
* @typedef {Object} customConfig
* @property {boolean} fullScreen=true Toggle full screen on and off
* @property {boolean} debugMode=true Toggle debug console.log messages
* @property {string} textColor=#00ff00 Default game text color
* @property {string} fillColor=0xff00ff Default game fill color
* @property {string} assetPath=../../assets/ The path prefix for game assets
*/
export default {
  fullScreen: true,
  debugMode: true,
  textColor: '#00ff00',
  fillColor: '0xff00ff',
  assetPath: '../../assets/',
};

name: customConfig
description: Your game's custom configuration values

properties.name: fullScreen
properties.description: Toggle full screen on and off

properties.name: debugMode
properties.description: Toggle debug console.log messages

properties.name: textColor
properties.description: Default game text color

properties.name: fillColor
properties.description: Default game fill color

properties.name: assetPath
properties.description: The path prefix for game assets

name: src/config/default.js
defaultConfig
description: Default Phaser configuration, for more settings see {@link https://photonstorm.github.io/phaser3-docs/global.html#GameConfig}

properties.name: type
properties.description: Phaser.AUTO, Phaser.CANVAS, Phaser.HEADLESS or Phaser.WEBGL. AUTO picks WEBGL if available, otherwise CANVAS.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the game, in game pixels

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the game, in game pixels

properties.name: zoom
properties.description: Simple scale applied to the game canvas. 2 is double size, 0.5 is half size, etc

properties.name: resolution
properties.description: The size of each game pixel, in canvas pixels. Values larger than 1 are "high" resolution

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The DOM element that will contain the game canvas, or its id. If null (the default) or if the named element doesn't exist, the game canvas is inserted directly into the document body

properties.name: canvas
properties.description: Provide your own Canvas element for Phaser to use instead of creating one.

properties.name: canvasStyle
properties.description: CSS styles to apply to the game canvas instead of Phaser's default styles.

properties.name: CanvasRenderingContext2D
properties.description: Provide your own Canvas Context for Phaser to use, instead of creating one.

properties.name: scene
properties.description: A scene or scenes to add to the game. If several are given, the first is started; the remainder are started only if they have { active: true }.

properties.name: seed
properties.description: Seed for the random number generator

properties.name: title
properties.description: The title of the game shown in the browser console

properties.name: url
properties.description: The URL of the game shown in the browser console

properties.name: version
properties.description: The version of the game shown in the browser console

properties.name: autoFocus
properties.description: Automatically call window.focus() when the game boots. Usually necessary to capture input events if the game is in a separate frame

properties.name: input
properties.description: Input configuration, or false to disable all game input. See {@link https://photonstorm.github.io/phaser3-docs/global.html#InputConfig}

properties.name: disableContextMenu
properties.description: Disable the browser's default 'contextmenu' event (usually triggered by a right-button mouse click)

properties.name: banner
properties.description: Configuration for the banner printed in the browser console when the game starts. See {@link https://photonstorm.github.io/phaser3-docs/global.html#BannerConfig}

properties.name: dom
properties.description: The DOM Container configuration object, see {@link https://photonstorm.github.io/phaser3-docs/global.html#DOMContainerConfig}

properties.name: fps
properties.description: Game loop configuration, see {@link https://photonstorm.github.io/phaser3-docs/global.html#FPSConfig}

properties.name: render
properties.description: Game render configuration, see {@link https://photonstorm.github.io/phaser3-docs/global.html#RenderConfig}

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: The background color of the game canvas

properties.name: callbacks
properties.description: Optional callbacks to run before or after game boot see {@link https://photonstorm.github.io/phaser3-docs/global.html#CallbacksConfig}

properties.name: loader
properties.description: Loader configuration see {@link https://photonstorm.github.io/phaser3-docs/global.html#LoaderConfig}

properties.name: images
properties.description: Images configuration see {@link https://photonstorm.github.io/phaser3-docs/global.html#ImagesConfig}

properties.name: physics
properties.description: Physics configuration see {@link https://photonstorm.github.io/phaser3-docs/Phaser.Physics.html}

properties.name: Plugins
properties.description: to install see {@link https://photonstorm.github.io/phaser3-docs/global.html#PluginObject} and {@link https://photonstorm.github.io/phaser3-docs/global.html#PluginObjectItem}

name: src/utilities/index.js

content:
# Phaser 3 Webpack ES6 Project Template

![Phaser Logo](../assets/logo.png "Phaser Logo")

A Phaser 3 project template using webpack, SASS, Babel ES6, and eslinter set to Aribnb preset. Includes a folder of example scripts to help start your development. ### Requirements We need [Node.js](https://nodejs.org) to install and run scripts. ## Setup & Development Commands Run the appropriate command in your terminal: | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `npm install` | Install dependencies and launch browser with examples.| | `yarn start` | Launch browser to show the examples.
Press `Ctrl + c` to kill **http-server** process. | | `yarn deploy` | Create a distributed version of the build that's minified and uglified. | | `yarn docs` | Generate ESDocs for the examples. | | `yarn jsdocs` | Generate JsDocs for the examples. | | `yarn lint` | Run the linter, defaults to using airbnb style guide (https://github.com/airbnb/javascript). | | `yarn lint:fix-dry-run` | Run the linter and automatically fix without saving changes. | | `yarn lint:fix` | Run the linter and automatically fix problems and save changes. | | `yarn test` | Run the unit tests. Looks for files matching the pattern `*.test.js`. | | `yarn test:watch` | Run the unit tests but keep watch for changes.
Press `Ctrl + c` to kill the watch process. |
name: ./README.md
